page.title: 18A day in the life of Claire.
page.content: At{7.00 am},I get up, then at{7.20 {am},I get the milk in.The{milkman comes round in a silent electric lorry.He leaves the milk bottles on my doorstep.When I have brought the milk in,I have my{breakfast}.I have cornflakes with milk and sugar.Then I have a cup of milk.After breakfast I have a wash, brush my hair, put my coat on and go to{school}.We cross the road outside school with the{lollipop {lady}.She walks into the middle of the road when there are no cars coming and holds up a sign that looks like a lollipop.In the morning at school we do{Maths}and{English}.I have dinner at school, and in the afternoon I do{Art, {Environmental Work}or{P.E}.When I get home at{4.00 pm}, I watch television, have tea at{5.00 pm},then read my library book or do some knitting before bed at{8.00 pm}. (C.Maybury)
